title: RSA® SecurID (Authentication Manager)
descriptionMarkdown: The [RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager](https://www.securid.com/) data connector provides the capability to ingest [RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager events](https://community.rsa.com/t5/rsa-authentication-manager/rsa-authentication-manager-log-messages/ta-p/630160) into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to [RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager documentation](https://community.rsa.com/t5/rsa-authentication-manager/getting-started-with-rsa-authentication-manager/ta-p/569582) for more information.
additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**RSASecurIDAMEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-rsasecuridam-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.query:
RSASecurIDAMEvent
 | summarize count() by tostring(DvcHostname)
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: Syslog (RSASecurIDAMEvent)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
RSASecurIDAMEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
RSASecurIDAMEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(3d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**RSASecurIDAMEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-rsasecuridam-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
>**NOTE:** This data connector has been developed using RSA SecurID Authentication Manager version: 8.4 and 8.5

instructionSteps.title: 1. Install and onboard the agent for Linux or Windows
instructionSteps.description:
Install the agent on the Server where the RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager logs are forwarded.

> Logs from RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager Server deployed on Linux or Windows servers are collected by **Linux** or **Windows** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Linux agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the Windows agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Windows Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Windows Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager event forwarding
instructionSteps.description:
Follow the configuration steps below to get RSA® SecurID Authentication Manager logs into Microsoft Sentinel.
1. [Follow these instructions](https://community.rsa.com/t5/rsa-authentication-manager/configure-the-remote-syslog-host-for-real-time-log-monitoring/ta-p/571374) to forward alerts from the Manager to a syslog server.
